title: Mosaic Cycles GT-1 iAR Integrated All Road
content:
Mosaic Cycles just announced an integrated version of its popular GT-1 AR, dubbed the GT-1 iAR. This new platform utilizes ENVE’s In-Route integrated cockpit and an increase in tire clearance. Check out more below.

 

The GT-1 iAR is a titanium chassis all-road platform that utilizes the ENVE Integrated Allroad Fork and ENVE Integrated Headset system to route your cables internally, away from visibility. 

The result is a streamlined cockpit, free from contamination and cables.

The GT-1 iAR is completely Made to Order, inclusive of custom geometry and complete choice of the Mosaic Finishwork Program. This process enables Mosaic to create a GT-1 iAR to fit each rider’s specific fit requirements, handling preferences, and riding aspirations perfectly, the way only a Made-To-Order Mosaic can.

Specs:

  • Tubeset || Rider Specific T3A/2.5V Double Butted Titanium Tubeset
  • Geometry || Made To Order (Stock geometry also available)
  • Tire Clearance || 700x40mm
  • Fork || ENVE Integrated Allroad Fork (47 or 51 rake)
  • Headset || ENVE Integrated Headset
  • Brake Mount || Flat Mount Disc
  • Brake Routing || Integrated Internal
  • Shift Routing || Integrated Di2 or eTap
  • Axle Spacing || 12×100 Front // 12×142 Rear
  • Bottom Bracket || Threaded BSA 68mm
  • Seatpost Diameter || 27.2 (30.9, 31.6 Optional)
  • Front Derailleur Mount || Clamp or braze on
  • Water Bottle Mounts || Two – Down tube and seat tube
  • Finish || Mosaic Finishwork Program
  • Lead Time || 6-8 weeks​
  • Pricing || $8300 Frameset Module
